headline: Boston Scientific (NYSE:BSX) Secures US$30-45 Million Deal with Bittium for ECG Devices
summary: Boston Scientific (NYSE:BSX) recently entered into a significant agreement with Bittium Biosignals Ltd. to supply ECG devices, valued between USD 30 to 45 million, which strengthens their cardiac diagnostics offerings. Despite this positive development, Boston Scientific’s share price saw a modest decline of 1.54% over the last quarter. This movement is in line with broader market conditions, which have remained flat in recent days and risen over the past year. Positive earnings results and...
